intro.title: Question
intro.description: How might we display the moment when hearing the songs you like in the movies/dramas?

how.title: How to Find the Website?
how.description: Based on real data, many people submitted these words for lyrics in a search engine:

hows.name: Search a sentence of a song.

hows.keyword: the umbrella academy i think we re alone now
hows.name: Search the names of a movie or drama with the sentence they heard.

obstacle.title: Current Search Process & Obstacles
obstacle.description: IMDB is the first stop to find out data of movies/dramas. However, it is hard to find by the lyrics because:

execuses.name: In the pages of a movie or drama, only song names are mentioned. To find lyrics, one has to search further

obstacle.conclusion: Therefore, there is a gap between the moment you hear the song and finding out which song it is.

mvp.title: Minimum Viable Product
mvp.description: Like many products, the website went public when it seemed working. It was primitive, but inviting search engines to know the content and having real visitors ASAP are more important.

expected.title: Expected Outcome
expected.description: Visitors find the songs and feel good with the “moments.”

grow.title: Growth
grow.description: It’s expected that creators in love with 60’s to 80’s culture continue to deepen the meanings of these songs.

ending: The side project is in active development. Try: What are the movies/dramas that David Bowie’s Heroes features?
